title: Schematic iMac 820-3481-A
message: Does anyone have this file? I need to work with one machine

title: Schematic iMac 820-3481-A
message: Not available, you can use 3478/82 and 00291 as guide.

title: Schematic iMac 820-3481-A
message:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://logi.wiki/index.php/Schematics_and_Boardviews_Availability#iMac[/URL]
[QUOTE]Use 820-3478 (1GB/4 chips VRAM vs. 2GB/8 chips VRAM for 820-3481), or 820-3299 for GPU area. [/QUOTE]
